the Skill

The Skills I have adquired over the years, are build over my curiosity and need. For work or for personal curiosity, I have a strong analystical mind and I recognise patterns. I like travelling back and forth from the abstract to the detail. These common patterns have facilitated the learning curve for profesional, lenaguage, culture or travelling that have been a constant in my life.

What follows is a list of the skills that I use regularly on my profesional capacity:

RPG & CL

Excellent

Used for AS/400 or iSeries. Other than maintaining legacy systems, I don't see myself developping it further. It's a pitty, because the language is very rich and I became extremely proficient with it

IT Project Management

Good

I have learnt the different methodologies (SDLC and Agile) as well as some of the tools (Jira, MS Project, Niku) used on this trade. I excel in team management, motivation and breaking silos. Complex inter-project dependencies.

Java & J2EE

Competent

Up to Java 8 and 9, mostly using it for API and Microservices, but also to the level of Generics.

Microservices & API

Very Competent

Microservices were the reason I started moving out of legacy systems towards distributed systems. I never went back.

Languages

Very fluent

English is the language I think in. Often, over my own mother tongue. French, although I learned it later in life, I also speak it very fluently. Of course Spanish and Catalan, as my mother tongue languages, I master them too.

Frameworks

Very competent

Spring, React, NodeJs, Cloud and Devops( Git, Jenkins, AWS, Heroku, PCF), Web related (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript)

Front End technologies

Competent

HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and then using Frameworks like Angular and above all React. This web site is fully put together using only HTML5, CSS3 andvery little JS. Once it's published on the cloud, I will move to the new React version where I will be adding more functionality, like multiple languages.

Business Areas

Excellent

Core and Commercial banking, Logistics and Distribution, ShowBusiness, Training)
